def_en: You use mere to emphasize how unimportant or inadequate something is, in comparison to the general situation you are describing.

def_cn: 极小的，微不足道的，单单(表示虽小却有重要影响)
def_en: You use mere to indicate that a quality or action that is usually unimportant has a very important or strong effect.

def_cn: 只不过，仅仅(用于强调数量之小)
def_en: You use mere to emphasize how small a particular amount or number is.
